namespace.description: Identifier for the file. It must be unique and must be different from the vanilla namespaces.

nm:type.description: Type of the UI element. It's required to have it otherwise it will throw an error.

nm:variables.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Changes variables values if conditions are met.

requires.description: Required condition to this changes to happen.
Required condition to this changes to happen.

nm:modifications.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Allows to modify the UI elements from resource packs below this one.

nm:ignored.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
If the UI element is ignored during parsing. It won't be used at all.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:visible.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
If the UI element should be visible.	
	
**Default**: ```true```

prop:enabled.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
If true and if the UI element or any of its children have the locked state then they will be in the locked.	
	
**Default**: ```true```

prop:layer.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Z-Index/Layer relative to parent element. Higher layers will render above.	
	
**Default**: ```0```

prop:z_order.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Z-Index relative to parent element. Higher layers will render above. Replaced with ```layer```.	
	
**Default**: ```0```	
	
**Version**: ```0.12 only```

prop:alpha.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Alpha/transparency of the element. It will only affect the parent UI element. Its children will be unaffected. If you want the alpha to apply for both the parent and children use ```propagate_alpha```.	
	
**Default**: ```1.0```

prop:propagate_alpha.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
If ```alpha``` should not only apply to the parent if possible but also all its children.	
	
**Default**: ```false```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.1```

prop:clips_children.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Cuts off everything beyond the bounderies of the UI element.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:allow_clipping.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
If ```clips_children``` works in the UI element. Otherwise, it won't have any effect.	
	
**Default**: ```true```

prop:clip_offset.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Offset from the start of the clipping.	
	
**Default**: ```[0, 0]```	
	
**Version**: ```? - ?```

prop:property_bag.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Property bag contains properties that are more related with the data than the actually structure of the UI element.

prop:selected.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Edit Box```	
	
If the text box is selected by default.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:use_child_anchors.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Use the anchor_from/anchor_to of the child of the UI element.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:anchor_from.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Start position origin relative to parent element.	
	
**Default**: ```center```

prop:anchor_to.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
End position origin relative to parent element.	
	
**Default**: ```center```

prop:offset.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Position of the UI element relative to the parent UI element. __[x, y]__	
	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent UI element*	
	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the UI element*	
	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the UI element*	
	
**Default**: ```[0, 0]```

prop:size.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Size of the UI element. __[width, height]__	
	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent UI element*	
	
 ___%c___ - *Width/height of children*	
	
 ___%cm___ - *Width/height of the largest child UI element*	
	
 ___%sm___ - *Width/height of sibling UI element*	
	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the UI element*	
	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the UI element*	
	
**Default**: ```[default, default]```

prop:max_size.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Maximum size of the UI element. __[width, height]__	
	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent UI element*	
	
 ___%c___ - *Width/height of children*	
	
 ___%cm___ - *Width/height of the largest child UI element*	
	
 ___%sm___ - *Width/height of sibling UI element*	
	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the UI element*	
	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the UI element*	
	
**Default**: ```[default, default]```

prop:min_size.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Minimum size of the UI element. __[width, height]__	
	
 ___px___ - *Pixels*	
	
 ___%___ - *Width/height of parent UI element*	
	
 ___%c___ - *Width/height of children*	
	
 ___%cm___ - *Width/height of the largest child UI element*	
	
 ___%sm___ - *Width/height of sibling UI element*	
	
 ___%x___ - *Width of the UI element*	
	
 ___%y___ - *Height of the UI element*	
	
**Default**: ```[default, default]```

prop:orientation.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Stack Panel```	
	
Direction the items stack inside ```stack_panel```.	
	
**Requires**: ```**type**: stack_panel```	
**Default**: ```vertical```

prop:color.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label | Image```	
	
Text color. __[r, g, b] (0 <= v <= 1)__	
	
**Default**: ```white```

prop:locked_color.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label | Image```	
	
Text color when a parent has ```enabled: false```. __[r, g, b] (0 <= v <= 1)__	
	
**Default**: ```white```

prop:hide_hyphen.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label```	
	
Hide hyphen caused by word breaking.	
	
**Default**: ```false```	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:notify_on_ellipses.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label```	
	
Array of names of the UI elements to notify when text gets or loses ellipses.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.3/1.4```

prop:locked_alpha.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label```	
	
Alpha/transparency of label when a parent has ```enabled: false```.	
	
**Default**: ```1.0```

prop:text_alignment.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label```	
	
Text alignment direction. It adjusts automatically based on ```anchor_from```/```anchor_to```.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.1```

prop:alignment.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label```	
	
Text alignment direction. It adjusts automatically based on ```anchor_from```/```anchor_to```.	
	
**Version**: ```? - ?```

prop:tts_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Main text for text to speech.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.11```

prop:tts_section_header.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Text to speech for the tts section.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.11```

prop:tts_inherit_siblings.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Element has siblings that use text to speech and inherits their tts.	
	
**Default**: ```false```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.11```

prop:ttsSectionContainer.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
The content belongs to a certain tts.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.15/1.16```

prop:tts_ignore_count.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Ignore how many elements are in queue for tts.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.15/1.16```

prop:tts_skip_message.markdownDescription:
**Type**: Any	
	
Doesn't allow text to speech and skip it.	
	
Default: false	
Version: +1.15/1.16

prop:text_tts.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Label```	
	
Text content for text to speech.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.15/1.16```

prop:texture.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Image path starting from pack root.

prop:allow_debug_missing_texture.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Display the missing_texture if the texture is not found.	
	
**Default**: ```true```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.11```

prop:uv.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Start position of the texture mapping. __[u, v]__

prop:uv_size.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Size of the texture mapping. __[width, height]__

prop:nineslice_size.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
9-slice. __[x1, y1, x2, y2]__ __[x1/x2, y1/y2]__ or just a number for all of them. An explanation of ninepath: [https://wiresareobsolete.com/2010/06/9-patches/](https://wiresareobsolete.com/2010/06/9-patches/).

prop:tiled.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
If the texture will tile when the size of the UI element is bigger than the texture size.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:clip_direction.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Start point position for the ```clip_ratio```. If ```down```, the image will begin to appear from the bottom.

prop:clip_ratio.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
How much to clip. From 0.0 to 1.0.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:clip_pixelperfect.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
If the clip should try to be most pixel accurate possible.	
	
**Default**: ```true```

prop:bilinear.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Use the bilinear function when resizing the image.	
	
**Default**: ```false```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.5```

prop:grayscale.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Image```	
	
Render image in black and white.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:sound_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Input Panel | Selection Wheel | Screen```	
	
Name of the sound event to be played.

prop:sound_volume.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Input Panel | Selection Wheel | Screen```	
	
Volume of the sound event to be played.

prop:sound_pitch.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Input Panel | Selection Wheel | Screen```	
	
Pitch of the sound event to be played.

sound_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Input Panel | Selection Wheel | Screen```	
	
Name of the sound event to be played.

sound_volume.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Input Panel | Selection Wheel | Screen```	
	
Volume of the sound event to be played.

sound_pitch.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Input Panel | Selection Wheel | Screen```	
	
Pitch of the sound event to be played.

prop:radio_toggle_group.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
If toggle belongs to a group. Each toggle of the group must have a different ```toggle_group_forced_index```.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:toggle_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle```	
	
Name of the toggle group that this toggle belongs to.

prop:toggle_default_state.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle```	
	
If the toggle is the one active from a group by default.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:toggle_on_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle```	
	
ID of the action for when the toggle is on.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:toggle_off_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle```	
	
ID of the action for when the toggle is off.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:toggle_grid_collection_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the item collection to be used. It can be empty.

prop:checked_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __checked__ state.

prop:unchecked_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __unchecked__ state.

prop:checked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __checked_hover__ state.

prop:unchecked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __unchecked_hover__ state.

prop:checked_locked_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __checked_locked__ state.

prop:unchecked_locked_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __unchecked_locked__ state.

prop:checked_locked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __checked_locked_hover__ state.

prop:unchecked_locked_hover_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Toggle | Dropdown```	
	
Name of the control that will only show up when toggle is on the __unchecked_locked_hover__ state.

prop:slider_small_decrease_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
ID of the action for the decrease slider.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:slider_small_increase_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
ID of the action for the increase slider.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:slider_steps.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
How many steps (or values) does the slider have.

prop:slider_collection_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the item collection to be used.

prop:slider_selected_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
ID of the action for when the slider is selected.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:slider_deselected_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
ID of the action for when the slider is deselected.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:slider_box_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the control element that will behave as the slider thumb.

prop:background_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the control that will behave as the slider background.	
	
**Info**: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:background_hover_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the control that will behave as the slider background on hover.	
	
**Info**: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:progress_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the control that will behave as the slider background overlay for the slider progress.	
	
**Info**: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:progress_hover_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Slider```	
	
Name of the control that will behave as the slider background overlay for the slider progress on hover.	
	
**Info**: It's not needed if you just want a static background.	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:tab_control.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Tab (Legacy)```	
	
Name of the element that shows up when tab is selected.	
	
**Version**: ```0.16 - 1.0```

prop:grid_dimensions.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Grid```	
	
Number of columns and rows the grid has. __[columns, rows]__

prop:maximum_grid_items.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Grid```	
	
Maximum number of items the grid will be able to generate.

prop:text_box_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Edit box```	
	
Different names, don't affect each others content. The names are hardcoded.

prop:text_edit_box_grid_collection_name.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Edit box```	
	
Name of the hardcoded item collection to be used. It can be empty.

prop:enabled_newline.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Edit Box```	
	
Allows text box to be multiline.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:text_type.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Edit Box```	
	
Which characters are allow in the text box.

prop:can_be_deselected.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Edit Box```	
	
Text box can be deselected.	
	
**Default**: ```true```

prop:scrollbar_track_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
ID of the action for the track button.

prop:scrollbar_touch_button.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
ID of the action for the touch input.

prop:scrollbar_box.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child UI element or nested UI element that will behave as the scrollbar thumb.

prop:scrollbar_track.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child UI element or nested UI element that will behave as the scrollbar track.

prop:scroll_view_port.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child UI element that will behave as the view port.

prop:scroll_content.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child UI element that will behave as the content root parent.

prop:scroll_box_and_track_panel.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
Name of child UI element that will contain the scrollbox and track controls.

prop:jump_to_bottom_on_update.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Scroll View```	
	
Jump to the bottom when the scrolling panel has an update. For example, adds more children to it.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:bindings.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Any```	
	
Bind data (coming from the code) to this UI element to use.

binding_type.description: Which kind of data binding will be used.

binding_name.description: Stores the value of the data bind name or condition with it.

binding_name_override.markdownDescription:
Name of the UI element property that will apply the stored value in ```binding_name```.	
	
**Requires**: ```binding_name```

binding_collection_name.markdownDescription: Name of the collection of items to be used.

binding_condition.description: Condition for the data binding to happen.

source_control_name.description: Name of the UI element to observe its property values.

source_property_name.markdownDescription:
Store the value of the property named of the UI element refered in ```source_control_name```.	
	
**Requires**: ```source_control_name```

target_property_name.markdownDescription:
The UI element property that the stored value in ```source_property_name``` will be applied to.	
	
**Requires**: ```source_property_name``` and ```source_control_name```

prop:default_focus_precedence.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_enabled.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_wrap_enabled.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:focus_magnet_enabled.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:focus_identifier.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_change_down.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_change_up.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_change_left.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_change_right.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:focus_mapping.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Edit Box | Input Panel | Grid```

prop:button_mappings.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```

from_button_id.description: ID of the action that fires the event.

to_button_id.description: ID of the action to be executed when event is fired.

consume_event.description: If false, it will not be focused.

prop:modal.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```

prop:inline_modal.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.1```

prop:always_listen_to_input.markdownDescription: **Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```

prop:always_handle_pointer.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
Always handle pointer even if it goes outside of the element.	
	
**Default**: ```false```

prop:always_handle_controller_direction.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
**Default**: ```false```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:hover_enabled.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
**Default**: ```true```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:prevent_touch_input.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
Prevents touch events from firing.	
	
**Default**: ```false```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.10```

prop:consume_event.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.2```

prop:consume_hover_events.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Button | Toggle | Dropdown | Slider | Slider Box | Edit Box | Input Panel | Scrollbar Box | Scrollbar Track | Scroll View | Screen | Selection Wheel```	
	
**Version**: ```+1.11```

prop:render_only_when_topmost.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen should only render when it's the top most screen in the screen stack.

prop:absorbs_input.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen allows user input.

prop:should_steal_mouse.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen should hide the mouse.

prop:low_frequency_rendering.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen should only render when it's the top most screen in the screen stack.

prop:screen_draws_last.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen is the last screen in screen stack to be rendered.

prop:force_render_below.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If screens below in the screen stack should render below.

prop:close_on_player_hurt.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Screen```	
	
If the screen should close when the player is hurt.

prop:renderer.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Custom```	
	
Special elements that are created in the code because they are too complex for JSON UI.

prop:color1.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Custom (Gradient Renderer)```	
	
Color of the top (```vertical```) or left (```horizontal```) half side. It can use alpha.

prop:color2.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Custom (Gradient Renderer)```	
	
Color of the bottom (```vertical```) or right (```horizontal```) half side. It can use alpha.

prop:text_color.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Custom (Name Tag Renderer)```	
	
Color of the name text. It can use alpha.

prop:background_color.markdownDescription:
**Type**: ```Custom (Name Tag Renderer)```	
	
Color of the name background. It can use alpha.
